p: This research is a large-scale scientometric study in the field of infectious diseases. We focus on the quantitative features and characteristics of infectious disease research over the past 2 decades. In this section, we present studies that analyze and survey real-world trends in the field of infectious diseases (see the Infectious Disease Trends subsection) and studies that relate to bibliometric trends in general and public health in particular (see the Bibliometric Trends subsection).
